item.title: SQLite: Past, Present, and Future
item.description: 1 INTRODUCTION 2 ARCHITECTURE 2.1 Modules 本文为摘录，原文为： attachments/pdf/2/p3535-gaffney.pdf 1 INTRODUCTION 链接到标题 SQLite is embedded in the process of the host application Instead of communicating with a database server across process boundaries, applications manage a SQLite database by calling SQLite library functions several characteristics combine to make SQLite useful in a broad range of scenario: Cross-platform 数据
